mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replys ( reply_no, board_no, mem_id, reply_content, reply_date, del_yn ) VALUES ( #{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{memId}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT a.reply_no, a.board_no, a.mem_id, b.mem_name, a.reply_content, TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS reply_date FROM replys a JOIN members b ON a.mem_id = b.mem_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY reply_date ASC

SELECT a.reply_no, a.board_no, a.mem_id, b.mem_name, a.reply_content, TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS reply_date FROM replys a JOIN members b ON a.mem_id = b.mem_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE replys SET del_yn = 'Y' WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo}
